nodes.text: Star Wars 94: Small Wars is the ninety-fourth issue of the Marvel Star Wars series of comics.

Han, Luke, Leia, Chewie, Lando, C3PO [sic] and R2-D2 are up to their ears in Ewoks and trouble when war breaks out between the Ewoks and Lahsbees! "Small Wars" written by Jo Duffy and premiering the work of the new STAR WARS penciler, Cynthia Martin! Inked by Tom Palmer.
